      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(double x,
                        double y)
        Set the view rotation to the given values
        Parameters:
        x - amount to rotate about the X axis, in radians
        y - amount to rotate about the Y axis, in radians

      • loadNewImage

        public boolean loadNewImage(android.graphics.Bitmap sphereImage)
        Load a new bitmap into the view. Replaces the prior bitmap. The supplied bitmap should not be recycled by the caller. This method is safe to call from any thread.
        Parameters:
        sphereImage - new image to load
        Returns:
        true if loaded successfully and caller should tell the renderer it is now dirty false if image load fails

        Called when the viewer is no longer open.
